price: 141.Ucud gaadul moominiinit yekkeh yan Buki Yalli yeemeneh yan mага munaafiqhiinik edde meexaah dambittek ken edde Saytunnoysamkeh, koros edde Baysamkeh Abe.
arabic: وَلِيُمَحِّصَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَيَمۡحَقَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waliyumaḥḥiṣa al-lahu alladhīna āmanū wayamḥaqa al-kāfirīna
